target: Sure, when would you like that reservation?
context: <user> i need a place to dine in the center thats expensive <system> I have several options for you; do you prefer African, Asian, or British food? <user> Any sort of food would be fine, as long as it is a bit expensive. Could I get the phone number for your recommendation? <system> There is an Afrian place named Bedouin in the centre. How does that sound? <user> Sounds good, could I get that phone number? Also, could you recommend me an expensive hotel? <system> Bedouin's phone is 01223367660. As far as hotels go, I recommend the University Arms Hotel in the center of town. <user> Yes. Can you book it for me? <system>
